body:
## Release Notes

- Add CODEOWNERS and settings.yml files. @iphydf (#179)
- Remove standard_travis flag, as it is becoming default. @iphydf (#178)
- Avoid unicode characters in .cabal files. @iphydf (#177)
- Minor simplification of toxsave-convert code. @iphydf (#176)

## Documentation

- add DHT groupchats packet protocols to spec @JFreegman (#195)
- update DHT-Groupchats spec @JFreegman (#191)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Allow higher versions of msgpack-types. @iphydf (#207)
- Update to new MonadValidate usage in `msgpack-types`. @iphydf (#204)
- Upgrade base16-bytestring package. @iphydf (#203)
- Use docker image for stack CI builds. @iphydf (#201)
- Use latest instead of versioned toktok-stack image. @iphydf (#199)
- Upgrade to latest toktok-stack @iphydf (#198)
- Use centralised workflows for CI. @iphydf (#197)
- Build the spec first before installing gems. @iphydf (#194)
- Update stack versions; support random < 1.3. @iphydf (#193)
- Use toktok-stack 0.0.23 for cirrus builds. @iphydf (#190)
- Upgrade to ghc-8.10.7 @iphydf (#181)
- Remove travis; add cirrus ci. @iphydf (#180)

## Maintenance (Code cleanup)

- Remove all unused imports. @iphydf (#205)
- Mark NodeList as Safe Haskell. @iphydf (#200)

## Maintenance (Tests)

- Remove all the msgpack RPC stuff for now. @iphydf (#183)
name: v0.2.12
